_meta.description: Structured notification dataset for all user roles

doctor.title: Critical Patient Alert
doctor.description: Patient John Doe (ID: 12345) requires immediate attention. Vitals show concerning trend

doctor.title: New Patient Assignment
doctor.description: You have been assigned a new patient: Sarah Williams. Review case file in your dashboard

doctor.title: Lab Results Ready
doctor.description: Laboratory results for patient Michael Brown are now available for review

doctor.title: Meeting Reminder
doctor.description: Multidisciplinary team meeting scheduled for today at 2:00 PM in Conference Room B

doctor.title: Prescription Renewal
doctor.description: Prescription for patient Emma Davis expires in 3 days. Please review and renew if necessary

doctor.title: Patient Progress Report
doctor.description: Patient David Thompson has shown 40% improvement in mobility assessments this month

doctor.title: Consultation Request
doctor.description: Dr. Anderson requests your consultation on a complex neurology case for patient review

doctor.title: New Research Study
doctor.description: New clinical trial on post-stroke rehabilitation methods now accepting patient enrollment

doctor.title: Patient Discharge Approval
doctor.description: Patient Lisa Martinez has been approved for discharge. Discharge summary completed

doctor.title: System Update
doctor.description: Electronic Health Records system will undergo scheduled maintenance this weekend

patient.title: Upcoming Session
patient.description: Your next rehabilitation session is scheduled for tomorrow at 10:00 AM

patient.title: Progress Update
patient.description: Great job! You have completed 85% of this week's exercises. Keep up the excellent work!

patient.title: Medication Reminder
patient.description: Don't forget to take your prescribed medication at 2:00 PM today

patient.title: New Exercise Added
patient.description: Your physiotherapist has added a new balance exercise to your routine

patient.title: Milestone Achieved
patient.description: Congratulations! You've reached 30 consecutive days of rehabilitation exercises

patient.title: Doctor Message
patient.description: Dr. Smith has sent you a message regarding your latest progress report

patient.title: Schedule Change
patient.description: Your appointment on Friday has been rescheduled to 3:00 PM due to doctor availability

patient.title: Exercise Completed
patient.description: You have successfully completed today's morning exercise routine. Great work!

patient.title: Health Tip
patient.description: Remember to stay hydrated during your exercises. Aim for at least 8 glasses of water daily

patient.title: New Resources
patient.description: New educational materials about stroke recovery have been added to your library

physio.title: Session Scheduled
physio.description: New rehabilitation session scheduled with patient Robert Chen tomorrow at 9:00 AM

physio.title: Exercise Plan Approved
physio.description: Dr. Williams has approved your customized exercise plan for patient Jennifer Lopez

physio.title: Equipment Maintenance
physio.description: Treadmill #3 requires maintenance. Please use alternative equipment for walking exercises

physio.title: Patient Progress Note
physio.description: Patient Mark Johnson has completed 90% of assigned exercises this week. Excellent adherence!

physio.title: Training Workshop
physio.description: New techniques workshop on post-stroke gait training available. Register by end of week

physio.title: Assessment Due
physio.description: Quarterly mobility assessment for patient Amanda White is due in 3 days

physio.title: Room Change
physio.description: Your 2:00 PM session has been moved from Therapy Room A to Therapy Room C

physio.title: Patient Feedback
physio.description: Patient Thomas Anderson left positive feedback about your rehabilitation guidance

physio.title: New Equipment Arrival
physio.description: Balance training equipment has arrived and is now available in the therapy center

physio.title: Protocol Update
physio.description: Updated rehabilitation protocols for stroke patients have been published in your resource library
